IProgram IProgram Interface

In this Article

Edit

Describes a program.

Syntax

Declaration

public interface IProgramPublic Interface IProgram

Properties summary

ArchiveWindowLength
ArchiveWindowLength

Gets or sets the archive window length.
Asset
Asset

Gets the asset associated with the program.
AssetId
AssetId

Gets or sets id of the asset for storing channel content.
Channel
Channel

Gets the channel associated with the program.
ChannelId
ChannelId

Gets id of the channel containing the program.
Created
Created

Gets program creation date.
Description
Description

Gets or sets description of the program.
Id

Gets Unique identifier of the program.
LastModified

Gets program last modification date.
ManifestName

Gets the streaming manifest name.

Name
Name

Gets name of the program.
State
State

Gets program state.
